humanum_full_description_en:
A Bronze like wine respect of shape, unearthed the Xia Dynasty two inside big mouth statue conform to the shape, is "wine Zun Zun " early pictographic text, the ancient word " unitary " may represent " wine ", " wine " word three-body stone by The ancient text is " Unity ". Later, under the guise of the name of the earth branch. The bottom of the wine tank is pointed, so that a small half of the wine tank can be buried in deeper ground for storage and preservation.

The oracle bone inscriptions read as wine, which means the sacrifice of recommended wine, and it is also used as the earthly branch. Bronze inscription means wine, Zai Fuyan: "Wang Xiang (é£¨) You (wine)", "Poetry. Daya. "Drunk": "Drunk with wine, and full with virtue." Used as the name of the earthly branch, it ranks tenth. Scholar: "Only (in) May, I am looking for Xinyou." It is also used as the name of a nation and a person.

"Said Wen": "You, it's also. In August, the millet is formed, it can be wine. It is like the shape of the ancient text. All the subordinates of the you are from the you. You, the ancient texts. From the Mao, Mao is the spring gate, everything is there. Out. You are the autumn gate, and everything has entered. One, it's like a closed door."

[â‘ ]ï¼»yÇ’uï¼½
["Guangyun" and Jiuqie, there is, to. ]
The present character of "ä¸£1".
(1) Wine.
(2) Refers to wine vessels.
(3) Mature; old.
(4) The extension is contraction.
(5) The tenth place of the twelve earthly branches. It matches with the heavenly stems, or is used to record the years in the Tai Sui chronology.
(6) The tenth place of the twelve earthly branches. It is used to record the month, that is, the eighth month of the lunar calendar.
(7) The tenth place of the twelve earthly branches. Used to record the day.
(8) The tenth place of the twelve earthly branches. Used to record time. That is, from 17:00 to 19:00.
(9) One of the zodiac signs. Is a chicken.
(10) Ponds for water storage.
(11) Link "Jew".
(12) Refers to Xiaoyou Mountain. See "you point", "you room".
(13) Last name. Three Kingdoms Wei has Youmu. See "Three Kingdoms Â· Wei Zhi Â· Gaotang Long Biography".
